data.title: Municipal Tramways Trust
data.meta_description: The Municipal Tramways Trust (MTT) was established by the Government of South Australia in December 1906 to purchase all of the horse-drawn tramways in Adelaide, South Australia. The Trust subsequently also ran petrol and diesel buses and electric trolleybuses. It ceased to exist on 8 December 1975, when its functions were transferred to the State Transport Authority, which also operated Adelaide's suburban train services.
data.text:
South Australian government transport operator 1906 to 1975 / From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
